statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'HEAD'); status=$(git -C "$current_dir" status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "$status" -gt 0 ]; then git_info=" (${branch}*)"; else git_info=" (${branch})"; fi; else git_info=''; fi; printf "\033[2m%s [%s] %s%s\033[0m" "$model" "$output_style" "$dir_name" "$git_info"
